title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Revised)
description: Gather and document the detailed requirements for the FutureScenariosGenerator system. This includes specifying the types of scenarios to be generated, input data sources, output formats, and target users and use cases. Additionally, we should outline the functional requirements such as real-time processing capabilities, security measures, scalability, and integration with existing systems. Also, consider including a section for non-functional requirements like performance expectations, error handling, and user interface design.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the FutureScenariosGenerator system, including the components, data flows, and integration points with external systems. This design should consider scalability, reliability, and security in accordance with best practices for AI-powered systems.

title: Develop Data Ingestion Pipeline
description: Implement a pipeline to ingest and preprocess data from various sources (e.g., news, social media, historical data) that will be used as input for scenario generation.

title: Implement Scenario Generation Model
description: Develop and train a machine learning model capable of generating plausible future scenarios based on the ingested data.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and implement a user interface that allows users to input parameters, trigger scenario generation, and visualize the generated scenarios.

title: Implement Scenario Analysis and Reporting
description: Develop functionality to analyze and report on the generated scenarios, including identifying trends, risks, and opportunities.

title: Set up Testing and Continuous Integration
description: Establish a testing framework and continuous integration pipeline to ensure the quality and reliability of the system.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Design and implement robust security measures including encryption, authentication, and authorization to protect sensitive data and ensure the system's integrity. Implement role-based access control for user management.

title: Deploy and Monitor the System
description: Set up the infrastructure and deploy the FutureScenariosGenerator system, including monitoring and logging mechanisms.
dependencies: Set up Testing and Continuous Integration

title: Create Documentation and User Guides
description: Develop comprehensive documentation and user guides to assist users in understanding and utilizing the FutureScenariosGenerator system.
